channel.title: 伽利略导航系统完全崩溃或由于意大利引起
channel.description: 伽利略导航系统完全崩溃或由于意大利引起

item.title: 伽利略导航系统完全崩溃或由于意大利引起[0-50]
item.description:
伽利略导航系统完全崩溃或由于意大利引起 欧洲全球卫星导航系统服务中心的网站于7月11日发表公告称伽利略系统服务暂时中断， 最新的NAGU显示其完全掉线。
DATE GENERATED (UTC): 2019-07-13 20:15
NAGU TYPE: GENERAL
NAGU NUMBER: 2019026
NAGU SUBJECT: SERVICE OUTAGE
NAGU REFERENCED TO: 2019025
START DATE EVENT (UTC): 2019-07-12 01:50
END DATE EVENT (UTC): N/A
SATELLITE AFFECTED: ALL
EVENT DESCRIPTION: UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE, USERS EXPERIENCE A SERVICE OUTAGE. THE SIGNALS ARE NOT TO BE USED.
https://www.gsc-europa.eu/notice ... -users-nagu-2019026
截至目前为止仍未恢复，整整72小时了。公告说预计不超过96小时。
如今的解释是：“看起来是意大利的地面精确计时设施出的问题”
Another source close to the program told us, “As far as I know, it is a problem of the PTF in Italy – time has an impact on the whole constellation!”
The Precise Timing Facility is a ground station that generates the Galileo System Time, or GST. The GST is uploaded to the Galileo satellites to make the user localization possible, and it is also disseminated to every user as an accurate time reference. The Precise Timing Facility hosts several Cesium clocks and a Hydrogen Maser clock.
https://insidegnss.com/update-galileo-service-degraded-on-all-satellites-precise-timing-facility-problems-cited/
item.content:encoded:
vasili:
伽利略导航系统完全崩溃或由于意大利引起
欧洲全球卫星导航系统服务中心的网站于7月11日发表公告称伽利略系统服务暂时中断， 最新的NAGU显示其完全掉线。
DATE GENERATED (UTC): 2019-07-13 20:15
NAGU TYPE: GENERAL
NAGU NUMBER: 2019026
NAGU SUBJECT: SERVICE OUTAGE
NAGU REFERENCED TO: 2019025
START DATE EVENT (UTC): 2019-07-12 01:50
END DATE EVENT (UTC): N/A
SATELLITE AFFECTED: ALL
EVENT DESCRIPTION: UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE, USERS EXPERIENCE A SERVICE OUTAGE. THE SIGNALS ARE NOT TO BE USED.
https://www.gsc-europa.eu/notice ... -users-nagu-2019026
截至目前为止仍未恢复，整整72小时了。公告说预计不超过96小时。
如今的解释是：“看起来是意大利的地面精确计时设施出的问题”
Another source close to the program told us, “As far as I know, it is a problem of the PTF in Italy – time has an impact on the whole constellation!”
The Precise Timing Facility is a ground station that generates the Galileo System Time, or GST. The GST is uploaded to the Galileo satellites to make the user localization possible, and it is also disseminated to every user as an accurate time reference. The Precise Timing Facility hosts several Cesium clocks and a Hydrogen Maser clock.
https://insidegnss.com/update-galileo-service-degraded-on-all-satellites-precise-timing-facility-problems-cited/

vasili:
The EU’s Galileo program posted an official notice on 11 July advising users that Galileo service is degraded on all satellites until further notice.
Our source inside the European GNSS Agency (GSA), which is the EU agency responsible for Galileo services, has told us “They are working on it. Teams from industry and the Agencies are working 24/7 to restore the Galileo services as soon as possible to their nominal levels. The current estimation is that the services should be restored within 48 hours. In any case, we expect the service to be again nominal before the end of the weekend ,” our source said.
为了尽快修复系统，欧洲白皮暂时启用了007工作制

Inquisitor:
昨天泥潭不是有人说是假消息吗
----发送自 STAGE1 App for Android.

aegisangel:
伽利略不是因为荷兰还是芬兰产的原子钟出问题导致寿命大幅下降吗

佐塚間桐:
当时说要和欧洲一起搞伽利略，欧洲不干，现在你看看你

呼和浩特:
双目失明伽利略

neptunehs:
本帖最后由 neptunehs 于 2019-7-14 11:07 编辑
Inquisitor 发表于 2019-7-14 10:57
昨天泥潭不是有人说是假消息吗
----发送自 STAGE1 App for Android.
昨天是说那个帖子里夸大其词 说是凉了吧
事实上是可修复的（自称）
当然这种问题某种程度来说确实是不可接受的 如果是商业项目那是当场凉了

及附属岛屿:
伽利略就是意大利人，总不能不带意大利猪玩吧
-- 来自 能看大图的 Stage1官方 iOS客户端

梁皇无忌:
aegisangel 发表于 2019-7-14 11:01
伽利略不是因为荷兰还是芬兰产的原子钟出问题导致寿命大幅下降吗
放在意大利地面的又不一定是意大利制造的
—— 来自 samsung SM-G9550, Android 9上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.1.2

9号单开道岔:
及附属岛屿 发表于 2019-07-14 11:43:46
伽利略就是意大利人，总不能不带意大利猪玩吧不讲笑话，意大利是宇航强国，是地面站和卫星制造的重要分包商
-- 来自 能手机投票的 Stage1官方 Android客户端

mu1:
还记得意大利因为低级计时失误搞出了“检测到超光速现象”的笑话

空虚澄璃色:
其实是外星人打来了，现在都是轻描淡写的掩饰？
—— 来自 Xiaomi MIX 2, Android 8.0.0上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.0.3-play

sblnrrk:
aegisangel 发表于 2019-7-14 11:01
伽利略不是因为荷兰还是芬兰产的原子钟出问题导致寿命大幅下降吗
这问题只是单点故障，现在是系统 崩溃，没有一颗能用
